name: Crystal Beast Sapphire Pegasus
desc: When this card is Summoned: You can place 1 "Crystal Beast" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell. If this face-up card is destroyed in a Monster Card Zone, you can place it face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell, instead of sending it to the GY.
str1: Place in Spell/Trap zone instead of destruction
